General.Name: Gan Yuan Foods Co Ltd
General.Description: Ganyuan Foods Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of beans, nuts, and other leisure food products in China. Its principal products include traditional roasted seeds and nuts, such as broad beans, melon seeds, green beans, peanuts, fried rice and beans, and nut products represented by cashew nuts and macadamia nuts. Ganyuan Foods Co., Ltd was founded in 2006 and is based in Pingxiang, China.
General.Address: Qingquan Biomedical Food Industrial Park, Pingxiang, China, 337000

1.Name: Mr. Haiyan  Yan
